::Spears:;

She was hit and burned by the fire ball.  She turned nad send 5 more 
quills at Savage.  She transformed into bot mode and pulled out a 
spear. She stood ready and looked at Savage.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Starscream/Gotron
> 
> Starscream and Gotron run out of the cave and thank Drillbit. 
> Starscream goes to jet moe, and let's Gotron into his cockpit. They 
> og up into the air and start doing a quick surveilance of any hurt 
> Preds or Alliance on the ground. They find none, and enter Phobia's 
> ship.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Brix/Fliq
> 
> "Alright," said Brix, "This should be enough hull. Let's go put it 
in 
> the ship and get out of here."
> 
> Brix and Fliq get pieces of the hull and head for the Iron Ram.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Savage
> 
> Savage sees the quils coming. one or two hit him, but the rest are 
> evaporated in the giant fireball that Savage shot right towards the 
> two lovebots.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Zava
> 
> Zava struggled to consioussness. She had been in Stasis lock for 
> awhile, and the battle was almost over. She could see Deemos, still 
> ifghting alone. She struggled to her feet, and walked, always 
> directly behind Deemos. When she got to him she whispered in his 
here.
> 
> "Deemos, look! Their escape ship is almost ready to leave. Give me 
> permission to stow aboard, and I'll sabotage it. It'll be destroyed 
> in huge flames. I have no problem's dying for the Chosen Ones."
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Vulois
> 
> Just when things looked their bleakess, Vulois thought he saw light 
> ahead.
> 
> "Windrazor! Terradive! Come quickly! Light is ahead! That's the 
> electric system I installed. It gets it's power from the TM3 
Machine, 
> made by our late friend Soundwave. If only I still had the driver. 
> It's probably still in Hell Beast's base, lying in his safety 
vault. 
> But anyway, let's go!"
> 
> Vulois broke into a run at this hope.
